help.string:
Hey there,
I am Robotics your personal assistent. Click me
for extensive help.

You can type your email address into the textbox.
Thus you can log into our system.
Before you are able to login - you need to register an account and choose a picture from our database.
Here you can browse our gallery and choose a picture for your picture password.
Now it is time to set your points. Be sure to choose at least 3 but not more that 5 points that you can remember in the order that you click to set them now.
This is just a logo, you can simply ignore it.
If you click here you will find email adresses. Do not pester, please.
You think it's nice but you have no clue what this is about? Click here for information.
Do not click the DISCLAIMER. Please don't.
Click the points you set as your password. Remember: The order is important and you should have set 3-5 points.
